Text:
Thank you for this. My girlfriend just said yesterday that she'd love to get the soundtrack, especially the main theme on her mp3 player today that she's gonna be traveling visiting her parents.

So this saved me the trouble of downloading the theme from youtube or such and convert it to mp3

Aaand ofcrouse I wanna grab this too.
So greatly appreciated.

Oh and it really is good quality :) 

Just listened to the main theme on my high quality headphones and had ridiculous amounts of chills down my spine. 

DAMN it's epic.
Thank you for uploading this, but must be noted that the quality is mediocre. Those who demanding high fidelity better wait for another release.

voth aan bahlok wah diivon fin lein

Modest quality. Still, thx for the torrent. By the way, laga234, plz give the CORRECT lyric translations:

Dragonborn, Dragonborn, by his honor is sworn,
keeping evil forever at bay, and the fiercest foes rout, when they hear triumphs shout, dragonborn, for your blessings we pray.
Thank you LiquidQC for the Skyrim soundtracks, i love everything about Skyrim.. ALL of it!

DO NOT DOWNLOAD

This is a TERRIBLE transcode - NOT 320KBPS. Tracks shelf at ~10khz, AWFUL AWFUL AWFUL quality.

Nice Name "dickdick".

This is LEGIT Thx

This looks awesome. If you ever feel like making a second soundtrack with epic tracks that may be considered "spoliers" I think that would be another great addition to people's collections.

Also if you could do the next one in a very high VBR that'd be great as they're already lossy to begin with so it would just save some space. (Mind you I'm a bit racist against CBR)
i used to listen to these terrible rips.. but then i took an arrow to the knee
Don't listen to haters, this is good quality!

Nice! Quality is brilliant, gonna set the main theme as the ringtone for my Blackberry :) Now everyone shall know that i am Dragonborn xD

This game is AWESOOOOOMMMEEEE :)))
All good quality. G-spot reports all at 320kbps, most at 44.1kHz.  Thanks for the effort!
